title: UFYB 118: Empathy & Other People’s Models
itunes:title: Empathy & Other People’s Models
description:
Listen in today to gain a new perspective on why it’s so hard to fundamentally understand that other people have totally different thoughts to you, and how you buy into the assumptions you have about what’s going on in their brain. If you don’t know what a model is, I’m giving you the basics to help you understand this concept better, and I’m also sharing my interpretation of what empathy really means.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/118
content:encoded:
Listen in today to gain a new perspective on why it’s so hard to fundamentally understand that other people have totally different thoughts to you, and how you buy into the assumptions you have about what’s going on in their brain. itunes:subtitle: How trying to understand someone else’s model can bring you so much relief.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
